summary: Verified admin sidebar restructure: 1) 'School Textbooks' group with 5 items (textbook-catalog, students-schools, presale-import, monday-textbook-sync, textbook-form-settings), 2) Messages moved to Commerce group, 3) Wallet has Monday.com Sync tab, 4) MondayModule has only 4 tabs (Workspaces, Webhooks, General, Public Widget), 5) UnatiendaModule has only retail tabs (6 tabs, no textbook tabs). Fixed runtime error in MondayTextbookSyncModule.

issues: Translation keys showing as labels (e.g., 'nav.textbookCatalog' instead of 'Textbook Catalog') - fallbackLabel may not be applied correctly

passed_tests: School Textbooks sidebar group exists with 5 items
students-schools module has 3 tabs: Students, Schools, School Year
monday-textbook-sync module has 4 tabs: Textbook Sync, Inventory Sync, Status Mapping, Sync Dashboard
textbook-form-settings module has 2 tabs: Textbook Order Form, Student Link Form
UnatiendaModule has 6 retail tabs: Inventory, Public Store, Stock Mov, Store Checkout Form, Config, Demo Data
UnatiendaModule has NO textbook tabs (Private Catalog, Pre-Sale, etc.)
MondayModule has only 4 tabs: Workspaces, Webhooks, General, Public Widget
Messages module renders in Commerce group
Frontend compiles with only pre-existing eslint warnings
action_items: Consider fixing i18n fallbackLabel logic - sidebar shows translation keys instead of fallback labels for School Textbooks items
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed BoardSelector crash in BookOrdersMondayTab.jsx - was using undefined 'allBoards' prop instead of 'boards' state variable
New modules (TextbookCatalogModule, StudentsSchoolsModule, MondayTextbookSyncModule, TextbookFormSettingsModule) correctly import and render existing tab components
AdminDashboard.jsx correctly implements navGroups with School Textbooks group and renderModule cases for all new modules
UnatiendaModule correctly slimmed to 6 retail-only tabs
WalletModule correctly imports and renders WalletMondayTab
MondayModule correctly reduced to 4 tabs (removed textbook/wallet imports and tabs)

bug_fix_applied.issue: Runtime error 'Cannot read properties of undefined (reading map)' in MondayTextbookSyncModule
bug_fix_applied.root_cause: BookOrdersMondayTab.jsx was passing 'allBoards' prop (undefined when component rendered standalone) to BoardSelector instead of 'boards' state which has fallback [] default
bug_fix_applied.fix: Changed BoardSelector props from 'boards={allBoards}' to 'boards={boards}' at lines 374 and 429

context_for_next_testing_agent: Sidebar restructure complete. All School Textbooks modules render correctly. Fixed BoardSelector crash in BookOrdersMondayTab. The sidebar shows translation keys (e.g., 'nav.textbookCatalog') instead of fallback labels - this is a minor i18n issue. Authentication uses /api/auth-v2/login endpoint.
